messages.message:
we have this old doc (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gDNq6b2nRhgdncJBxTfp15rNA711v6y_dChLASlaops/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.8sn7of2qjksk) that Hannah used to maintain, but it's quite outdated

i'm not aware of any other customer-facing checklist

we already have a post-install action (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C07E44G1DT7/p1750746972254869) for running various smoke tests

i see there's already been some discussion with Subbu and the team there https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C07E44G1DT7/p1753955516328989

other than the post-install action, i don't know of any scripts we can share :disappointed:
